name: The Wailing Well
description:
This is our submission for the VR Jan Jam 2022.

You are locked in a well. Find the keys by using your environment to escape your shackles and climb the chain to escape the well.


***NOTE***
Make sure your floor height is properly set before playing, otherwise you may not be able to reach to the ground

Assets used:
VRIF, FreeNightSky, EasyColliderEditor, SimpleInteractive Water
